feed.title: CHIEN LAB
feed.subtitle: Our group's research focuses on integrated circuits and their convergence with bio- and quantum technologies. We are dedicated to creating sensors and devices for point-of-care diagnostics and emphasizing continuous monitoring through wearables, implantable devices, injectables, and swallowables. Additionally, we explore millimeter-wave ICs for communication, sensing, and interfaces for qubits. Please come talk to us if you’re interested in!

entry.title: Paper Acceptance
entry.content: Ying-Han’s 60-GHz PLL paper using SWO has been accepted to IEEE Microwave and Wireless Technology Letter! Congratulations!

author.name: Ying-Han Chen, Pin-Yu Lin, Sih-Ying Chen

entry.summary: Ying-Han’s 60-GHz PLL paper using SWO has been accepted to IEEE Microwave and Wireless Technology Letter! Congratulations!

entry.title: Fellowship
entry.content: Congratulations to our NTU lab member Wei-Yang on receiving the Berkeley-Taiwan Fellowship!
entry.summary: Congratulations to our NTU lab member Wei-Yang on receiving the Berkeley-Taiwan Fellowship!

entry.title: Fellowship
entry.content: Congratulations to Wei on receiving the prestigious NSF GRFP Fellowship!
entry.summary: Congratulations to Wei on receiving the prestigious NSF GRFP Fellowship!

entry.title: AE role
entry.content: Prof. Jun-Chau Chien started the Associate Editor role for IEEE Transactions on Biomedical Circuits and Systerms (T-BioCAS) and IEEE Solid-State Circuits Letters (SSC-L)! Welcome submissions!
entry.summary: Prof. Jun-Chau Chien started the Associate Editor role for IEEE Transactions on Biomedical Circuits and Systerms (T-BioCAS) and IEEE Solid-State Circuits Letters (SSC-L)! Welcome submissions!

entry.title: Congratulation on passing NTU oral defense!

link.title: Congratulation on passing NTU oral defense!

entry.content: Congratulation to Hung-Yu, Yan-Ting, Ying-Han, and Guan-Yu on passing the NTU oral defense! Good job!
entry.summary: Congratulation to Hung-Yu, Yan-Ting, Ying-Han, and Guan-Yu on passing the NTU oral defense! Good job!

entry.title: Welcome New Undergraduate Researchers!
entry.content: Welcome Guru Rajesh, Alex Di, Jimmy Yang, Shanw Zhang, and Tony Li for joining the group! Exciting!
entry.summary: Welcome Guru Rajesh, Alex Di, Jimmy Yang, Shanw Zhang, and Tony Li for joining the group! Exciting!

entry.title: AMX/Xilinx support!
entry.content: Thanks to AMD/Xilinx’s support for developing a novel phase-noise cancelling PLL!
entry.summary: Thanks to AMD/Xilinx’s support for developing a novel phase-noise cancelling PLL!

entry.title: IEEE J-MEMS paper acceptance
entry.content: Congratulation to Wei-Yang’s paper being accepted to IEEE J-MEMS! Paper title: “Impedance Sensing in CMOS-Embedded Microfluidics Using BEOL Electrodes”. Nice work! Wei-Yang!
entry.summary: Congratulation to Wei-Yang’s paper being accepted to IEEE J-MEMS! Paper title: “Impedance Sensing in CMOS-Embedded Microfluidics Using BEOL Electrodes”. Nice work! Wei-Yang!

entry.title: Drift Cancelation Paper Published!
entry.summary: Our first journal paper is published!

author.name: Yan-Ting Hsiao, Hung-Yu Hou, Yun-Chun Su, Ya-Chen Tsai
